Pre-Game Insights: The favored Twins have -217 moneyline odds to win against the underdog Angels, who are listed at +179.
The over/under is 9 runs for this game (with -104 odds to go over and -117 odds on the under).
The Twins have entered the game as favorites 98 times this season and won 59, or 60.2%, of those games.
Minnesota is undefeated in 11 games this season when favored by -217 or more on the moneyline.
The Angels have been victorious in 53, or 44.5%, of the 119 contests they have been chosen as underdogs in this season.
This season, Los Angeles has been victorious three times in eight chances when named as an underdog of at least +179 or worse on the moneyline.
Others: The game is the final game of a three-game series between the Twins and Angels at Target Field in Minneapolis, Minnesota.
The game is scheduled to start at 7:10 p.m. ET.
